title: Citi Named Best Foreign Bank Branch in Bulgaria
summary: Sofia - Citibank Bulgaria was named Best Foreign Bank Branch in Bulgaria for 2012 at the 16th annual Bank of the Year awards. The Bulgarian Bank of the Year Association presented the awards at a high-profile ceremony attended by the Central Bank Governor, representatives of government and other regulatory bodies, business, media and the banking community. A special guest at the ceremony was Leszek Balcerowicz, the prominent Polish economist and former Deputy Prime Minister of Poland.
tag-1: Citi Named Best Foreign Bank Branch in Bulgaria
tag-2: Sofia – Citibank Bulgaria was named Best Foreign Bank Branch in Bulgaria for 2012 at the 16th annual Bank of the Year awards. The Bulgarian Bank of the Year Association presented the awards at a high-profile ceremony attended by the Central Bank Governor, representatives of government and other regulatory bodies, business, media and the banking community. A special guest at the ceremony was Leszek Balcerowicz, the prominent Polish economist and former Deputy Prime Minister of Poland.
tag-3: This is the third consecutive award for the Bulgarian franchise in recognition of its performance and high level of customer service. Accepting the award, Stefan Felstein, Citi Country Officer for Bulgaria, said, "It is both a privilege and honor for Citi Bulgaria to receive this prestigious award. We thank the jury and the Association. We look forward to continuing to serve our clients' needs both in Bulgaria and around the world."
tag-4: Every year, the Association recognizes leadership and top performance in the banking industry and the jury, which consists of CEOs of large local and multinational companies, heads of key business organizations, top financiers, media and PR experts rank all banks operating in Bulgaria on the basis of complex criteria and hard data provided by the Bulgarian National Bank.
tag-5: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
